title: Can anyone go to Coachella? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yup. If you have enough money to buy everything you’d need. I went 2 years ago with a large group of friends because camping there for the event adds up (sometimes I regret going because my experience wasn’t the best. But I also don’t really like stuff like that and went because I had nothing better to do lol). So yeah, anyone with enough money can go.
As long as you have an ticket.
